snippet: Houthi rebel fighters seized Hazm, capital of Jawf Province, tightening their control of the country despite a monthslong, Saudi-led bombing campaign.
abstract: Houthi rebel fighters take Hazm, capital city of Yemen's Jawf Province, consolidating their control over country despite Saudi-led bombing campaign.
lead_paragraph: Houthi rebel fighters seized Hazm, capital of Jawf Province, tightening their control of the country despite a monthslong, Saudi-led bombing campaign.

headline.main: Houthi Rebels in Yemen Seize a Capital
headline.print_headline: Rebels in Yemen Seize a Capital
